edge_1: During one of International Rescue's first operations, Jeff abandoned The Hood in a collapsing illegal diamond mine, but rescued his half-brother, Kyrano. As revenge, The Hood plans to use Thunderbird 2 to rob ten of the world's major banks, thus plunging the international monetary system into chaos.
edge_2: The Hood is a psychic criminal mastermind.
